IMPORTANT: Icon PNG files need to be generated!

The icon.svg file is provided, but PNG files are required for the extension to work properly.

To generate PNG icons:
1. Run: npm install
2. Run: npm run generate-icons

This will create all required PNG files:
- icon16.png
- icon48.png  
- icon128.png
- icon16-disabled.png
- icon48-disabled.png
- icon128-disabled.png

Alternatively, you can manually convert icon.svg to PNG using:
- Online tools (e.g., cloudconvert.com)
- ImageMagick: convert icon.svg -resize 128x128 icon128.png
- Any image editor (GIMP, Photoshop, etc.)
